name: Spicy2048
description:
Hold mouse button and swipe in any direction to move.

Spicy2048 is a fun and addictive casual game that challenges you to merge blocks to reach the top. Move the blocks and match them in numbers to merge them together and create a higher number. Keep merging the blocks to reach the highest number possible.

With simple and easy-to-learn gameplay mechanics, Spicy2048 is perfect for players of all ages. The game features colorful graphics and exciting sound effects that will keep you engaged and entertained.

Whether you're looking for a quick pick-me-up during your break or a relaxing way to unwind after a long day, Spicy2048 is the perfect game for you. Download now and see how high you can go!

(The Idea is similar to the original version of 2048 but I wanted to add spicy/game feel to my game and make it interesting whenever player get's bigger and bigger numbers).

Roadmap:
-More colorful visuals

-Different gameplay (shapes, map size, movement)

I'm open for any idea and suggestion what should I replace/change or add into my game !
